articles.title: India vs Australia, 4th Test, Day 4 Live Score Updates: Virat Kohli Nears 200, But Axar Patel Departs Against Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: IND vs AUS Live Score Updates, 4th Test Day 4: Virat Kohli is nearing his double hundred but he is running out of partners as India are eight down against Australia on Day 4 of the ongoing fourth Test.
